thread.title: Serge Delage
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Serge Delage

author: Serge Delage
title: Serge Delage
text:
Excellent service ,suggestion on what will be great for my house.
Rob Ferrell had excellent customer service advice and did follow through his service problem recovery . Since the install i can see a huge difference on my water softness and taste.
I hope it get only better from there.
thank
you
serge delage
